description:
import urlparse

should be changed to :
import six.moves.urllib.parse as urlparse

for python3 compatible.
title: urlparse is incompatible for python 3

comments.content:
import urlparse

should be changed to :
import six.moves.urllib.parse as urlparse

for python3 compatible.

comments.content:
Per J Nowak - But, we currently don't support py3 in Solar. Changing this import changes nothing, it also would add six to requirements (which are not required by solar itself now).  

Will revisit when Solar support py3.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lamt

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/python-barbicanclient 4.0.0 release.
